medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient has had worsening abdominal distention and pain for the past week. She also endorses vomiting and decreased flatus. Her last bowel movement was 2 nights ago, and she has not tolerated oral intake for a week.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Parkinson's disease, diabetes mellitus, depression, anxiety, hypertension, restless leg syndrome, history of C-section and laparoscopic cholecystectomy
